title: Enormous 3BD/1BATH with Washer/Dryer Next Door To Prospect Park!
posting_body: ['VIDEO TOUR: https://youtu.be/5QD7vZGtliM', 'Price advertised is the net rent!', 'Gross is $3400 with 2 months free on a 12 month lease.', 'You will be asked to pay the gross rent on a 12 month lease.', 'This means that you will pay 10 months of $3400 and two months will be free rent.', 'Schedule with me to get a better feel for the unit.', 'The owner is offering 1 free year of parking (for one spot).', 'Welcome to this classic south Brooklyn building in Prospect Leffert Gardens.', 'A short walk to Prospect Park, close to plenty of bars, restaurants, coffee shops that the neighborhood has to offer.', 'It is 2 blocks from the 2,5 train at the Winthrop stop.', 'This is a perfect apartment for roommates!', 'Watch video tour to get a better feel!!!', 'This apartment includes:', 'An enormous living area big enough for any size sectional!', 'A king sized master bedroom', 'The other 2 can easily fit queen size beds', 'All bedrooms have closets', 'A washer/dryer in unit', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Hardwood floors throughout', 'Heat and Hot Water Included', 'Please Text/Email/Call Mason to set up a viewing', 'Must meet income and credit requirements', 'Guarantors Welcome!']
